text: Change is constant.

And in a world of 
ever-evolving security needs,

AWS Security
is on the frontline.
We work in small teams,

focused on protecting
our global customers,
and their data.

We're always
seeking the best talent...

that shares
our passion...

for setting
the security bar higher.

We are the guardians of
customer privacy and trust.
We are relentless...

in our pursuit
and development...

of solutions to meet our
customers' security needs.
Our team of...
security engineers,
software developers,
and compliance specialists...

are setting the
standard for security...

in the cloud
and of the cloud,

and you could be
part of that team!

Security for AWS
and our customers...
requires constant innovation,

that matches the
velocity of AWS development...

and the
scalability of the internet.

Come join the team
that's redefining how IT...

security and
compliance get done.
At Amazon,

we're
peculiar and passionate.
We're builders and pioneers.

And we're waiting
for you here at AWS.
